metadata.name: clover
metadata.description:
ARTWORK : YAMA  
MUSIC : COWMAN

いつも仲良しの4匹  
ある時浜辺で小瓶を拾いました  
中には宝の地図が  
それから夜遅くまで調べもの  
みんな思い思いに  
ワクワクをふくらませています  

これから始まる4匹の冒険の序章曲

Always good friends Hanabi, Cher, Knot and Luca.  
Found the mysterious bottle on the beach one day.  
Secret treasure map in the bottle.  
They stayed up reserching late into the night.  
They all get their own ideas and filled with excitement.  

The prelude to the adventures of them.

YAMA  
https://twitter.com/yama_nft  
https://lit.link/YAMAnft  

COWMAN  
https://twitter.com/CryptoBokujo  
https://sound-desert.com/artists/cowman
